title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\SetMaintenancePolicyRequest
name: SetMaintenancePolicyRequest
description:
SetMaintenancePolicyRequest sets the maintenance policy for a cluster.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.SetMaintenancePolicyRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.project_id
params.description: Required. The Google Developers Console project ID or project number.

params.name: data.zone
params.description: Required. The name of the Google Compute Engine zone in which the cluster resides.

params.name: data.cluster_id
params.description: Required. The name of the cluster to update.

params.name: data.maintenance_policy
params.description: Required. The maintenance policy to be set for the cluster. An empty field clears the existing maintenance policy.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The name (project, location, cluster name) of the cluster to set maintenance policy. Specified in the format projects/*/locations/*/clusters/*.
